snippet.title: Old School Trailer
snippet.description:
As the new title suggests, you can now relive your school days in 3D - where "Old School" graphics bring back timeless fun! Its console debut is also the 1st time the concept has ever been adapted for a controller with multiplayer opportunities:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/old-school-switch/

As well as Switch, the game is also now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2529120/Old_School/

iOS:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/old-school-3d/id1673720627

...and Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MDickie.OldSchool
